elder.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
elder.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Sarah is the elder of the two.
His elder son Liam became a lawyer.
elder.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old
elder.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: a meeting of the village elders
elder.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: someone who has an official position of responsibility in some Christian churches
elder.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a small wild tree that has white flowers and black berries
